title: Fara juna biyu lafiya
tip: A tabbata kina samun isasshen hutu da abinci mai kyau don lafiyar ki da jariri.
who_tips: Ci abinci mai gina jiki kamar 'ya'yan itatuwa da kayan lambu.
Guji shan taba da shan giya.

title: Ci gaba da lura da lafiyar ki
tip: Kula da shan ruwa sosai da gujewa damuwa.
who_tips: Sha ruwa akalla kofi 8 a rana.
Yi motsa jiki mai sauki kamar tafiya.

title: Tabbatar da ganewar juna biyu
tip: Ka je wurin likita don tabbatar da juna biyu da samun shawarwari na farko.
who_tips: Yi gwajin ciki domin tabbatarwa.
Fara shan folic acid don taimakawa ci gaban jariri.

title: Kula da lafiyar mahaifa
tip: Guji yin abubuwan da zasu iya cutar da jariri kamar shan magunguna ba tare da izini ba.
who_tips: Guji shan magunguna marasa izini.
Ka je wurin likita idan kana jin zafi ko wani abu daban.

title: Fara motsa jiki mai sauki
tip: Yi motsa jiki kamar tafiya mai natsuwa domin kara lafiyar jiki.
who_tips: Guji yin motsa jiki mai nauyi sosai.
Ka tabbata kana shan ruwa sosai.

title: Rike lafiyar zuciya da jini
tip: Ka ci abinci mai dauke da iron domin kauce wa rashin jini.
who_tips: Ci abinci mai dauke da iron kamar naman kaji, wake, da koren ganye.
Yi gwajin jini don ganin matakin iron.

title: Guji damuwa
tip: Ka guji damuwa da yanayi marasa kyau domin lafiyar jariri.
who_tips: Yi nazarin hanyoyin shakatawa kamar yin addu'a ko sauraron waka.
Ka kwanta da wuri don samun isashen hutu.

title: Kula da lafiyar hanci da baki
tip: Yi wanka da kyau da kuma kula da lafiyar baki domin kauce wa cututtuka.
who_tips: Kwasfa haƙori sau biyu a rana.
Guji amfani da abubuwan da zasu cutar da baki.

title: Kara yawan cin abinci mai gina jiki
tip: Ka ci abinci mai dauke da bitamin da ma’adanai da suka dace.
who_tips: Ci abinci mai dauke da Vitamin C kamar lemu da ayaba.
Ka tabbata kina shan ruwa da yawa.

title: Kula da nauyin jiki
tip: Kula da nauyin jikinki don kauce wa matsalolin lafiya.
who_tips: Kiyaye nauyin jiki a hankali.
Yi motsa jiki mai sauki kamar tafiya.

title: Kiyaye tsaftar jiki
tip: Ka kula da tsaftar jiki don rage yiwuwar kamuwa da cututtuka.
who_tips: Wanke hannu kafin cin abinci.
Yi wanka akai-akai.

title: Kula da zafin jiki
tip: Ka guji zama a yanayi mai zafi ko sanyi sosai.
who_tips: Ka sha ruwa sosai domin kiyaye danshi a jiki.
Guji fita a rana sosai.

title: Ci gaba da shan folic acid
tip: Folic acid yana taimakawa wajen rage hadarin matsalolin haihuwa.
who_tips: Ci abinci mai dauke da folate kamar kabeji da wake.
Ka cigaba da shan folic acid har zuwa mako na 12.

title: Kula da lafiyar jiki gaba daya
tip: Ka tabbatar kana samun isashen barci da hutu.
who_tips: Yi barci akalla sa'o'i 7-8 a dare.
Guji damuwa da gajiya sosai.

title: Kula da hawan jini
tip: Ka duba hawan jini akai-akai don kauce wa matsaloli.
who_tips: Ka guji cin abinci mai yawa gishiri.
Yi motsa jiki mai sauki.

title: Kulawa da jin dadi
tip: Ka yi abubuwan da zasu kara maka jin dadi da kwanciyar hankali.
who_tips: Yi shakatawa ta hanyar karatu ko kallo fina-finai masu dadi.
Ka guji abubuwan da zasu sa ka cikin damuwa.

title: Lura da ci gaban jariri
tip: Ka je wurin likita domin duba ci gaban jariri.
who_tips: Yi amfani da ultrasound idan likita ya ba da shawara.
Ka tambayi likita duk lokacin da ka damu.

title: Kula da abinci mai kyau
tip: Ka ci abinci mai wadataccen sinadaran gina jiki.
who_tips: Ka ci kayan lambu masu launin kore da ja.
Ka sha madara ko madarar kayan lambu.

title: Guji shan taba
tip: Shan taba na iya haifar da matsaloli ga jariri.
who_tips: Guji shan taba koda a cikin gida.
Ka nemi taimako idan kana son daina shan taba.

title: Kulawa da fata
tip: Ka kula da fata domin rage kumburi da bushewa.
who_tips: Yi amfani da man shafawa mai laushi.
Guji wanka da ruwan zafi sosai.

title: Kulawa da lafiya ta zuciya
tip: Ka rage damuwa domin lafiyar zuciya da jini.
who_tips: Yi tunani mai kyau da addu'a.
Ka guji abubuwan da zasu sa ka damuwa.

title: Ci gaba da motsa jiki
tip: Yi motsa jiki domin taimakawa jiki da lafiyar jariri.
who_tips: Yi tafiya mai natsuwa akalla minti 30 a rana.
Ka guji motsa jiki mai nauyi sosai.

title: Lura da nauyin jiki
tip: Kula da nauyin jikinki daidai domin kauce wa matsalolin kiba.
who_tips: Ka ci abinci mai kyau ba tare da yawa ba.
Ka yi motsa jiki akai-akai.

title: Kula da lafiyar hakora
tip: Yi brush na hakora da kyau don kauce wa cututtukan baki.
who_tips: Yi brush sau biyu a rana.
Ka ziyarci likitan hakora lokaci-lokaci.

title: Ka guji shan kwayoyi marasa izini
tip: Kar ka sha kowane magani ba tare da shawarar likita ba.
who_tips: Ka nemi shawarar likita kafin shan magani.
Ka guji amfani da magungunan gargajiya marasa tabbaci.

title: Kulawa da numfashi
tip: Ka guji zama a wuraren da ake da hayaki ko datti.
who_tips: Ka guji shakar hayaki ko datti mai yawa.
Ka tabbatar iska tana shiga gida sosai.

title: Shan ruwa mai tsafta
tip: Sha ruwa mai tsafta akai-akai don lafiyar ki da jariri.
who_tips: Ka sha ruwa mai tsabta ko wanda aka tace.
Ka guji shan ruwa daga wuraren da ba a tabbatar ba.

title: Ci gaba da shan folic acid
tip: Folic acid na taimakawa wajen kariya daga matsalolin haifuwa.
who_tips: Ka ci gaba da shan folic acid har zuwa karshe.
Ka ci abinci mai dauke da folate.

title: Kulawa da tsarin narkar da abinci
tip: Guji cin abinci mai sa kumburi ko tashin zuciya.
who_tips: Ci abinci a hankali da sauki.
Guji kayan abinci masu yaji sosai.

title: Ka rika yin gwaje-gwaje
tip: Yi gwaje-gwajen likita da aka tsara don duba lafiyar jariri da ki.
who_tips: Ka bi jadawalin gwaje-gwaje na likita.
Ka tambayi likita idan akwai matsala.

title: Ka kula da garkuwar jiki
tip: Ka ci abinci mai karfafa garkuwar jiki kamar citrus fruits.
who_tips: Ka ci kayan itatuwa masu Vitamin C.
Ka huta sosai don karfafa jiki.

title: Lura da alamomin matsala
tip: Ka lura da alamomin kamar zafi ko jini domin neman taimakon likita.
who_tips: Ka gaggauta zuwa asibiti idan akwai jini ko zafi mai tsanani.
Ka sanar da likita duk wani abu daban.

title: Kula da lafiyar jijiyoyi
tip: Yi hutun da ya dace don rage kumburin kafafu.
who_tips: Ka rika dagawa kafafu sama lokaci-lokaci.
Ka guji tsayawa ko zama a wuri guda na dogon lokaci.

title: Ka guji shan caffeine mai yawa
tip: Rage shan caffeine kamar kofi ko shayi mai karfi.
who_tips: Ka iyakance shan caffeine zuwa kofi daya ko biyu a rana.
Ka guji shan caffeine kafin barci.

title: Kula da karfin garkuwar jiki
tip: Ka ci abinci mai dauke da antioxidants kamar berries.
who_tips: Ka ci kayan lambu masu launi daban-daban.
Ka sha ruwa da yawa.

title: Shiri don haihuwa
tip: Ka fara shirya kayayyakin da za ka bukata don haihuwa da kuma samun natsuwa.
who_tips: Ka shirya kayan jariri da wurin haihuwa.
Yi shiri na tunani don rage damuwa kafin ranar haihuwa.

title: Kula da motsin jariri
tip: Ka lura da motsin jariri don sanin cewa yana lafiya.
who_tips: Ka lura da motsin jariri akai-akai.
Ka je wurin likita idan motsin jariri ya ragu sosai.

title: Kiyaye lafiya kafin haihuwa
tip: Ka kula da lafiyarki sosai, ka ci abinci mai kyau, ka huta sosai.
who_tips: Ka guji yin aiki mai nauyi.
Ka sha ruwa sosai.

title: Shiri don haihuwa mai sauki
tip: Ka yi shiri na ruhaniya da na zahiri don haihuwa mai kyau.
who_tips: Ka yi addu’a da tunani mai kyau.
Ka tuntuɓi likitan ki ko masu jinya domin shawarwari.

title: Kammala shiri don haihuwa
tip: Ka tabbatar an shirya komai domin ranar haihuwa.
who_tips: Ka tabbatar kayan jariri sun shirya.
Ka tuntuɓi likita idan akwai wani canji a jikin ki.
